entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
